adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

anger point.name: Anger Point
anger point.description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

aroma veil.name: Aroma Veil
aroma veil.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

aura break.name: Aura Break
aura break.description: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.

battle armor.name: Battle Armor
battle armor.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

battle bond.name: Battle Bond
battle bond.description: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.

beast boost.name: Beast Boost
beast boost.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

big pecks.name: Big Pecks
big pecks.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

cheek pouch.name: Cheeck Pouch
cheek pouch.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

clear body.name: Clear Body
clear body.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

color change.name: Color Change
color change.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.description: Prevents all status conditions except Sleep.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

cursed body.name: Cursed Body
cursed body.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

cute charm.name: Cute Charm
cute charm.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

damp.name: Damp
damp.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

dark aura.name: Dark Aura
dark aura.description: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.description: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.description: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

delta stream.name: Delta Stream
delta stream.description: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.

desolate land.name: Desolate Land
desolate land.description: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.

download.name: Download
download.description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

drought.name: Drought
drought.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dry skin.name: Dry Skin
dry skin.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

early bird.name: Early Bird
early bird.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

effect spore.name: Effect Spore
effect spore.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

electric surge.name: Electric Surge
electric surge.description: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

emergency exit.name: Emergency Exit
emergency exit.description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

fairy aura.name: Fairy Aura
fairy aura.description: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

flame body.name: Flame Body
flame body.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

flare boost.name: Flare Boost
flare boost.description: Powers up special attacks when burned.

flash fire.name: Flash Fire
flash fire.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

flower gift.name: Flower Gift
flower gift.description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

flower veil.name: Flower Veil
flower veil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: Reduces damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

full metal body.name: Full Metal Body
full metal body.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

grass pelt.name: Grass Pelt
grass pelt.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

grassy surge.name: Grassy Surge
grassy surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

honey gather.name: Honey Gather
honey gather.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

hyper cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hyper cutter.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

ice body.name: Icy Body
ice body.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

inner focus.name: Inner Focus
inner focus.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

iron barbs.name: Iron Barbs
iron barbs.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

iron fist.name: Iron Fist
iron fist.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

keen eye.name: Keen Eye
keen eye.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

leaf guard.name: Leaf Guard
leaf guard.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

lightning rod.name: Lighting Rod
lightning rod.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

limber.name: Limber
limber.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

liquid ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquid ooze.description: Damages attackers using any draining move.

liquid voice.name: Liquid Voice
liquid voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

long reach.name: Long Reach
long reach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magic guard.name: Magic Guard
magic guard.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

magma armor.name: Magma Armor
magma armor.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

marvel scale.name: Marvel Scale
marvel scale.description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

mega launcher.name: Mega Launcher
mega launcher.description: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

minus.name: Minus
minus.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

misty surge.name: Misty Surge
misty surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

mold breaker.name: Mold Breaker
mold breaker.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

moody.name: Moody
moody.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

motor drive.name: Motor Drive
motor drive.description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

natural cure.name: Natural Cure
natural cure.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

no guard.name: No Guard
no guard.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.description: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

own tempo.name: Own Tempo
own tempo.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

parental bond.name: Parental Bond
parental bond.description: Allows the Pokémon to attack twice.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

poison heal.name: Poison Heal
poison heal.description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

poison point.name: Poison Point
poison point.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

poison touch.name: Poison Touch
poison touch.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

power constuct.name: Power Contruct
power constuct.description: Changes form when HP drops below half.

power of alchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
power of alchemy.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

primordial sea.name: Primordial Sea
primordial sea.description: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.

prism armor.name: Prism Armor
prism armor.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

psychic surge.name: Psychic Surge
psychic surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

quick feet.name: Quick Feet
quick feet.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

rain dish.name: Rain Dish
rain dish.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.description: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

rks system.name: RKS System
rks system.description: Changes type depending on held item.

rock head.name: Rock Head
rock head.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

rough skin.name: Rough Skin
rough skin.description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

run away.name: Run Away
run away.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

sand force.name: Sand Force
sand force.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

sand rush.name: Sand Rush
sand rush.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

sand stream.name: Sand Stream
sand stream.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

sand veil.name: Sand Veil
sand veil.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

sap sipper.name: Sap Sipper
sap sipper.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

serene grace.name: Serene Grace
serene grace.description: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

shadow sheild.name: Shadow Shield
shadow sheild.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

shed skin.name: Shed Skin
shed skin.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

sheer force.name: Sheer Force
sheer force.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

shell armor.name: Shell Armor
shell armor.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

shield dust.name: Shield Dust
shield dust.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

shields down.name: Shields Down
shields down.description: Changes stats when HP drops below half.

skill link.name: Skill Link
skill link.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

slush rush.name: Slush Rush
slush rush.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

snow warning.name: Snow Warning
snow warning.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

solar power.name: Solar Power
solar power.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

soul-heart.name: Soul-Heart
soul-heart.description: Raises Special Attack when an ally faints.

speed boost.name: Speed Boost
speed boost.description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

stance change.name: Stance Change
stance change.description: Changes form depending on moves used.

static.name: Static
static.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

stench.name: Stench
stench.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

sticky hold.name: Sticky Hold
sticky hold.description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

storm drain.name: Storm Drain
storm drain.description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

strong jaw.name: Strong Jaw
strong jaw.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

suction cups.name: Suction Cups
suction cups.description: Negates all moves that force switching out.

super luck.name: Super Luck
super luck.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

sweet veil.name: Sweet Veil
sweet veil.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

swift swim.name: Swift Swim
swift swim.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

tangled feet.name: Tangled Feet
tangled feet.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

tangling hair.name: Tangling Hair
tangling hair.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

thick fat.name: Thick Fat
thick fat.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

tough claws.name: Tough Claws
tough claws.description: Boosts the power of contact moves.

toxic boost.name: Toxic Boost
toxic boost.description: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

unburden.name: Unberden
unburden.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

victory star.name: Victory Star
victory star.description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

vital spirit.name: Vital Spirit
vital spirit.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

volt absorb.name: Volt Absorb
volt absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

water absorb.name: Water Absorb
water absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

water bubble.name: Water Bubble
water bubble.description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves and prevents burns.

water compaction.name: Water Compation
water compaction.description: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

water veil.name: Water Veil
water veil.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

weak armor.name: Weak Armor
weak armor.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

white smoke.name: White Smoke
white smoke.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

wimp out.name: Wimp Out
wimp out.description: Switches out when HP drops below half.

wonder skin.name: Wonder Skin
wonder skin.description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

zen mode.name: Zen Mode
zen mode.description: Changes form when HP drops below half.
